thread.title_full: Private Florida island on sale for $6.9m | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Private Florida island on sale for $6.9m | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Always dreamed of getting away from it all? Former rock star's off-the-grid private island in the Florida Keys on sale for $6.9 million Melody Key, a stunning little island in the Florida Keys, has gone on the market for $6.9 million It features a three-bedroom villa and is completely off the grid, running on solar panels and desalinization Also boasts a freshwater pool, air conditioning, high-speed internet and an incredible rooftop platform Was previously owned by the lead singer of 311, Nick Hexum, who sold it in 2011 to a British developer Published: 19:17 GMT, 19 February 2017 | Updated: 01:46 GMT, 20 February 2017 42 shares
